pack_name: Eastern Bihar – First Aid & Community Health | पूर्वी बिहार – प्राथमिक चिकित्सा
citation_titles: Journal of Trauma and Acute Care Surgery - DOI:10.1097/TA.0000000000000485
text: Step-by-step improvised tourniquet using cloth and stick. Severe Bleeding.

pack_name: Eastern Bihar – First Aid & Community Health | पूर्वी बिहार – प्राथमिक चिकित्सा
text: Immobilize fractures with splint. Arm and leg. Broken bone.

pack_name: Eastern Bihar – First Aid & Community Health | पूर्वी बिहार – प्राथमिक चिकित्सा
text: ORS: 6 level tsp sugar + 1/2 level tsp salt in 1 liter clean water.

pack_name: Eastern Bihar – First Aid & Community Health | पूर्वी बिहार – प्राथमिक चिकित्सा
text: Evaporative cooling with wet cloths to neck/armpits/groin and fanning.

pack_name: Eastern Bihar – First Aid & Community Health | पूर्वी बिहार – प्राथमिक चिकित्सा
text: Wash bite with soap and running water for 15 minutes; seek vaccination.

pack_name: Eastern Bihar – First Aid & Community Health | पूर्वी बिहार – प्राथमिक चिकित्सा
text: Do NOT cut, suck, ice, or tourniquet; immobilize and transport urgently.
